api.description: The translation API to use. Currently only 'baidu' is supported.

api.appid.description: The appid for the translation API.

api.appkey.description: The appkey for the translation API.

api.originalLang.description: The language code to translate from.

api.targetLang.description: The language code to translate to.

processor.input.description:
A list of regex patterns to match and replace in the input text.

The regex patterns are applied in the order they are defined in the list.

processor.output.description:
A list of regex patterns to match and replace in the output text.

The regex patterns are applied in the order they are defined in the list.

regex.description: A valid Python regex pattern to match.

replace.description: The replacement string to use when the regex pattern matches.
